The Qihe Zhaoguan Coal Mine is an underground coal mine located in Zhaoguan Town, Qihe County, Dezhou City, Shandong Province

operators: Shandong Xinkuang Zhaoguan Energy Co Ltd
web_search_companies.notes: Shandong Xinkuang Zhaoguan Energy Co Ltd is a subsidiary of Yankuang Group Co Ltd.
